You wake up to a consistent prodding.
"Leave me alone, Tori," you said, pulling the covers over your head. You felt a strong tug, and fall out of the bed.
"Tori, what the hell!" you said, indignantly "What did you do that for?" It was only then you noticed Tori standing with her hands on her hips, as if she's waiting for an explanation "What did I do?"
"Who are you? Why are you in my room? How did you get in here? And why do you look like me?" asked Tori.
Now you were really confused. "Tori, what are you talking about? I'm your sister, Tami. I've been your sister since five minutes after you were born. I'm in here because we've shared a room for our whole lives, I got in here through the door, and I'm confused that you don't seem to remember me."
"Because I only have two sisters, a younger one called Amy and an older one called Amanda. My only other sibling is my twin brother, (your name), where is he, anyway?"
"We've never had a brother, Tori," you said, starting to get a little upset that your twin sister, your best friend didn't remember you "I don't know what you're talking about." You wipe your eyes before a tear falls from them. You were not going to cry. But Tori noticed. You could tell.
"Look," you said, pointing at the ink on the door that showed both your names, and the numerous pictures around the room of you and her in various identical outfits "We're sisters. That's the only explanation." You couldn't take it anymore, as tears fell from your eyes.

Tori immediately sat down on the bed and pulled you towards her, giving you a big hug and rocking you, saying: 'Let it all out. It's ok. Just let it all out." As you cried though, Tori stared at the top of your head.
"I used to do this to..." her eyes widened "(your name)?"

"Oh, never mind," said Tori, seeming to brush it off "Why don't you go downstairs? Make yourself some dinner. I'll be down in a minute."
"O-OK," you said, sniffing slightly as you went downstairs.

After you reached the bottom of the stairs, Tori went to what had used to be your room. Momentarily surprised by the new room layout, Tori began searching around for anything that seemed out-of-place. Under the bed, she found your old phone, with warning message still on it.
"Well, now I know why I wasn't affected," said Tori. She had been training for a charity race for the last few months, and usually drove out of the city to attempt running on rough terrain. It is the distant future. You have volunteered to be one of thousands traveling to a distant planet to colonize it. In order to conserve resources, you and the other colonists are to be placed in suspended animation for the length of the journey.

When you awaken, you are surprised: You had been a man on Earth, but you are a woman on this new world.

The captain explains that an accident caused the deaths of many of the women en route. There are still enough colonists for a healthy gene pool, but hundreds of men had to be changed into women for mating purposes.
154.title: Space colony

1541.content:
Ken woke up in the protective suspension fluid. It was a strange sensation before, but now it was downright weird. He felt very odd for some reason, but the fogginess of his mind and the mask covering his face made things hard to read. At any rate, they must have arrived in orbit since he was being revived now. The fluid slowly drained, and it only felt more and more strange to Ken. Finally, the capsule opened. Ken could feel the cool air of the ship wash over his body. It gave him a slight chill, and oddly enough, it made his nipples go rock hard.

An older man was next to him. As Ken looked at him, he was frowning, "Hello. If you recognize me, just nod. You are still weak from the suspension." Ken nodded. The captain continued, "You are okay. The bio-scans say you are in perfect physical condition, so do not panic over what I am about to tell you." Ken did not like the sound of that, but he waited as the captain went on. "While we were traveling, there was an emergency. A group of scientists who did not want humans to, in their view, pollute the universe, planted a virus in the suspension fluid of the females on the trip. By the time we realized there was a problem and I was taken out of suspension, it was too late to do anything for them."

He used his hands to hold Ken down as he continued, "We were not able to save any of them, but we were able to save the DNA of half of them. With the guidance of the computer, and some pre-planning that we thought we would never need, we were able to use their DNA to build a retro-virus to rewrite the DNA of some of the males. It worked, and we still have enough of a gene pool to grow a healthy colony here."

He paused, then he added, "We used a random selection to determine which males would be the ones who changed, then introduced the virus into their suspension fluid to initiate the change. The bad news is that you were one of the men chosen. The good news is that you are in perfect health, and should have no trouble having children when the time comes."

With that last statement, Ken's eyes went wide! One hand ripped off the mask. He heard a feminine sounding gasp as his other hand found his crotch, only to find it flat, and a thick bush of hair covering what could only be his new womanhood! Well, 'her' womanhood. She sat up weakly, feeling the weight on her chest as her breasts shifted. "How, how dare you do this to me? To any of us?" She gasped a bit as a wave of dizziness overcame her momentarily, "You had no right!"

The captain sighed as he handed Ken a towel, "Well, yes, we did. It was part of the contract you signed, under survival of the colony clause. We never expected this of course, but it was fully legal. In any case, it is not reversible. You could not survive a second exposure, and your system is now immune to the virus. And just to be sure, we did not preserve your old DNA." He grinned, "On the bright side, you are the prettiest girl to have revived so far. Whoever gets mated to you will be a lucky man."

Ken remembered the terms. There was no time for various mating rituals. Part of the contract was that your mate would be selected at random within your professional group. Ken had not balked at this since she had hoped to get a pretty wife, not BE a pretty wife! "I won't do it! I will not mate with some strange man!"

The captain chuckled, "Well, you might be surprised when the time comes." He handed Ken one of the unisex uniforms that looked tiny to Ken, but must have been her size now. "In any case, you might want to think about your new name while you get washed up and dressed." He grinned, "You don't look like a 'Ken' anymore." He stood up and said, "I have many more colonists to wake up. When you are cleaned up, report to briefing room X45. We need you to get some of the de-orbiting systems started." As Ken stood up, she realized that the captain now towered over her. She did not know what to say as the captain walked away.

She felt like she was half alien now as she walked to the nearby bathroom. When she got inside she saw a full length mirror and gasped as she saw herself for the first time. There stood

15412.content:
Ken heard the feminine gasp that came from her mouth as she looked in the mirror. There in front of her was an absolutely beautiful Asian girl! She had long, dark hair, dark eyes and her skin was not the white she had been used to all of her life, and she looked incredible and exotic. It took a moment for Ken to wonder why she had not noticed the different shade of her skin before this? She shook it off. She felt gross from the suspension fluid, and a shower and getting dressed was needed first. After she was cleaned up, she could spend more time inspecting this new body.

As she showered, she found her new body feeling less and less alien. Ken reasoned, 'Of course. I still have two arms, two legs, a head and so on. It is not like I became a different creature. I just changed gender.' In the back of her mind she wondered why she was not freaking out more, but there was no time for that. As she washed 'certain areas', she had to admit that it felt good. At one point she even found her mind wandering and thinking about what it might feel like to have a man touching her there. When she realized what she had been thinking she shook herself out of it and finished quickly.

She had dried off and had just figured out how to wrap her long hair in a second towel when a naked, blonde girl came walking into the showers. Ken looked at her long, blonde hair, wet and matted with the thick remnants of the suspension fluid. Ken noted some differences between them. She was caucasian, had a more defined figure than Ken, and much larger breasts. Ken's were B cup at most. Ken recovered first from the shock. "Hi. My name is Ken. Well, for now at least. Welcome to New Terra I guess."

She smiled, "Thanks." She seemed shy, "My name is, well, Mike for now. Nice to meet you."

Ken tried to keep moving, "The showers feel great after being in that goop. They even have good shampoo for us. See you outside." Ken smiled and moved on. Again, it was only later that she realized that she had just seen a beautiful, buxom blonde woman totally naked, and not only did she not feel attracted to her, but she also did not feel embarrassed to be naked in front of her either. She would have to wonder about that later though. She needed to get ready and report for duty.

She sat at an ID station. As soon as she did, the computer did a facial recognition scan and spoke, "Recognition. Physical: Li Na Ling, Original Ken Williams. Please choose given name or choose random."

Ken pondered this. She had no idea what to choose for a name. At last she just said, "Random."

The computer was fast. It immediately responded, "New ID created for Li Na Williams." She started to protest. For some reason she had not been expecting a Chinese name, but she supposed it fit. Like it or not, she was now one of the colonists who carried the Chinese/Asian genetic code, and so a cultural name might not be bad anyhow.

She sighed, "Okay, have it your way. I need a personal hygiene kit and the location of my personal quarters." The computer produced a carry bag that looked suspiciously like a purse. Ken/Li Na frowned and opened it. It contained various things for feminine hygiene, but also included a hair brush and makeup. Ken/Li Na found that she enjoyed the feeling of brushing out her hair. It was very soothing for some reason. Since it was there in front of her, she also put makeup on, and was surprised that she knew how. She then dressed, wearing a bra and panties for the first time. She was surprised how comfortable they felt. The uniform was unisex, but only now did Ken/Li Na notice that hers was a coral color. More pink than the grey she had seen before.

She hurried to finish and head to her quarters before 'Mike' came out of the shower. She was not ready for more human interaction yet. The day of shock was not over for her yet. She got to her room, and when she opened the door and stepped in, the first thing she saw was that there were beds on both sides of the room. She spoke up, "Computer, there must be some mistake. I am a grade P12. I am supposed to have private quarters."

The computer responded, "Negative. Ken Williams was a P12. Li Na Williams is rated P3."

She was shocked, "What? That is impossible! There has to be some mistake. I was supposed to be a manager! What is my job assignment?"

The always calm computer said, "Li Na Williams is assigned to satellite deployment and programming, grade P3 assistant deployment technician, for initial phase colonization."

Now she was upset, "ASSISTANT Technician?!?!? I am supposed to be managing engineer of that section! Who authorized this change?"

Calmly the computer said, "Change authorized by Captain Zimmer."

Ken/Li Na was furious. This was a huge demotion from what was promised! Why? They all were to receive additional training through the neural connections in flight. She was to be higher because of her prior knowledge made it possible to give her higher training levels since she was not starting from scratch. She should be above a P8 just with her degree and experience alone, not to mention the additional neural conditioning training she got on the way!

She placed her things on the side of the room indicated for her, affixed her com-badge so that she would have access, then headed to the deployment center. She was going to rip somebody's head off over this!

154121.content:
One thing that Ken/Li Na had noticed the most about her new body were her short legs. She had been 6'3" as a male. She noticed on her new ID that she was now 152 cm, which she had to convert to compare, and it meant that she was not quite five feet tall anymore! That meant more walking for sure! If she had to become female, why couldn't they have made her a taller one?

When she finally reached the deployment center, everything looked larger than before. Of course that was only because she was so small now. She saw a man she recognized as the director. Apparently she was among the first to be revived since she saw nobody else in the room yet, and this was a key facility. She walked boldly up to the man, "Director Jones! There is a serious problem to correct here!" She had not realized how short she really had become. She had walked to within inches of him, and she had to look way up to look him in the face.

He frowned down at her, "What seems to be the problem Miss….?" She supplied Williams. "What seems to be the problem Miss Williams? We have a lot of work to do so it better be important."

She found that the more she was in his presence, the more intimidated she felt. He was a male, and he had equipment she no longer did. In fact, she had the receiving complement to his, and it was something she could not seem to forget. She shook herself free of that and said, "I was supposed to be rated a P12 on revival. When I got to my quarters, I find I have been assigned shared quarters because I am only rated P3, that needs to be fixed before I can continue!"

He turned red, "Girl, you have some nerve! We are in a survival situation here! Remember, this was a one way trip! I will tell you this much, then I expect you to get to work. Since you are female, as soon as we reach the surface and have established a base camp, you will be mated and soon after no doubt be in baby mode. We cannot have some pregnant woman with fluctuating hormones running important systems or making important decisions! So you were granted an appropriate level of duties. I will grant you temporary P8 access until we are up to full compliment though."

Ken/Li Na was stunned, "What kind of sexist attitude is that? I thought we outgrew that kind of thinking long ago?"

He got angry again, "Listen to me right now woman!" He pointed, "Get to that station and start the deployment process for the sensor and weather satellites! We need maps and conditions. When you are off-shift, you may look up the Captain if he is willing to talk to a woman, but if you don't get there now, I will demote you to P1!"

Ken/Li Na found herself almost terrified of this man! "Y-y-y-yes Sir!" She rushed to her station! Soon she was running diagnostics on the satellites. As soon as one cleared, she assigned it to the next available orbit. Some of the controls were actually hard to reach with her short arms, but she was not about to complain. She focused completely on her task to forget the fear and humiliation she felt from the Director. Yes, humiliation, because she felt so inferior to him. And for some reason, that inferiority had its source in the fact that she was female. She did not know why, but it was true. It did not help when more men showed up. She really had to focus on her work then.

Eventually, a man walked up to her, "You, girl, what is your name?"

She looked up at him, "I am Li Na Williams. Who are you?"

He frowned, "I am your supervisor. I will take over here." He pointed to a technician, "You will be working with Mr. Connor over there. Do as he says and you will be okay Li Na." When Ken/Li Na stood there staring up at him, he frowned, "Women!" He grabbed her shoulders, turned her toward Connor, then said, "Now get over there girl!" WIth that he slapped her hard on her butt.

She yelped, but again felt like she had no choice. She went to Connor and introduced herself. He grinned, "Good. I could use some help, even female help. Start here with checking these orbits." She wound up checking the orbits of the satellites that she put there before any of these men had been there. Before some had even been revived no doubt. Ken/Li Na did not know what was worse; checking work that she or others had already done, or the way in which her supervisor seemed completely okay with groping or pinching her at will. She was happy to get off shift. Not only because she was tired, but because she needed time to soak in why she was putting up with all of this stuff.

In her room she found...

1541211.content:
She was relieved when she got back to her room and found it empty. There were things laying on the other bed, so she knew she had a roommate, but for now at least, she was alone. She had walked briskly the whole way back, so she was overheated. She stripped down to her underwear, drank some water, then used the bathroom. When she came back out, she opened the closet on her side to discover that her clothing had been delivered. Not hers really of course. They belonged to some dead Chinese woman who never made it here. Ken/Li Na was only the one who inherited them. She flipped through them. There were a lot of skirts and dresses. The drawers now contained a great variety of lingerie of every feminine type. Finally she found an oversize sleep-shirt. In spite of being purple, it was the least feminine thing she could find, so she put it on.

She sat down at her terminal. She wanted to research some things. She had noticed that, of the twenty people who worked in the deployment center, eight of them, including herself, were women. In displaying the duty roster, sure enough, no female was above P4, and only one reached that high. Why? The director had told her it was because of women needing to have babies. But there had to be more to it than that. Pregnant women often worked where they came from. Frequently right up until they delivered. After that, if they wanted to be, they were back within days, so that could not be the only reason.

She had just logged out and was considering what to wear to get something to eat when the door opened. She instinctively covered herself, but as she looked up, it was a woman who walked in. She was tall, but then who wasn't tall to her? A tall, buxom Latina woman with shoulder-length, brown hair. She stopped in her tracks as she saw Ken/Li Na. They stared at each other a bit, then Ken/Li Na decided to break the ice. "Hi. I am Li Na Williams. It looks like we are roommates. You may call me just Li if you like."

She seemed to relax. She walked over to her bed and sat down. "Hi Li. I am Carisa Johnson." She sighed, "Sorry for my reaction. I have been accosted by so many men today that I was kind of hoping to have some time alone."

Ken/Li Na shook her head. "Trust me. I understand. I was about to get dressed and go for something to eat. Would you like to join me? I could wait a while."

Carisa smiled, "Only if you don't mind talking. Now that you are here, I think I would like talking to another woman more than be alone."

Ken/Li Na said, "Go for it. What did you want to talk about?"

Carisa's smile turned into a frown, "Why? Why us? Why are we demoted? Why did I let guys grope me all day? And why…" She paused, "Why don't I mind? I mean. It is like I expect it. I never treated women that way as a man. Why do they, and why do I let them treat me that way?"

Ken/Li Na sighed, "All the same questions I have been asking. You don't seem to buy the answers we were given either." She looked at Carisa, "It is almost like we have been conditioned somehow. I…" Just then she was hit by a splitting headache like she had never felt in her life. She moaned and laid on her bed holding her head. "Ah! Maybe you can get cleaned up. Hopefully this headache will go away by the time you are ready."

It did go away while Carisa was in the shower. It had been so bad, Ken/Li Na could not even remember what her and Carissa had been talking about before it hit. She felt much better now, and somehow different. When they were getting dressed, she spent a lot of time picking out a nice dress though she was not even sure why.

They went to the galley, and it was the first time either of them had been around men in a social setting of any kind. While they were sitting and eating, two men sat with them and Ken/Li Na was surprised to find that...

"Well looks like that's YOUR ride, have fun at the north pole, Elf resources will take good care of you, and Merry Christmas."

"What? No i didn't sign up for..." you start to says as you feel a magical light surround you and in a flash you are standing in a sort of inside landing pad in what felt like an airport, with other pointy eared people around your height appearing all around you.

"Hey don't just stand there, we need the arrival space." another elf says to you ushering you to move along.

"But there has been a mistake, i'm not an elf!" you say

A few elves standing near by look over to you.

(Now how do we want to treat this swap, if Candy knew how its not like its forbidden magic, but how common is this? Does it happen all the time, or is it rare? Do the elves find it hilarious, or are they annoyed that an experience elf has been replaced with a clueless stand in, or do they treat you like you are crazy because the same reality shift that will make your family and friends think he is you makes everyone think you are her, or is that only on human side because elves are magical creatures which are immune to reality shifting magic?)
155332211.title: Yes, after the holidays

Okay everyone now this is either a genius way of tests new story ideas or it’s just me being lazy. But either way, I’m going to use each story to present some of my random body swap and/or transformation thoughts without having to worry about writing a detailed set up. And for now I’m not going to worry so much about rules but I do reserve the right to remove anything I believe to be inappropriate or just a pointless filler

Enjoy :)
